summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Jefferson Park Division No. 2, being the alley between 14th Avenue South and Columbian Way, from Dakota Street to Nevada Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherewise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14283 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
